# suppressMessages() Function

## Brief Description
The suppressMessages() function is used to suppress printed messages to the R console from a given expression.

## What Package Contains It?
The function is a part of the base R package.

## When to Use It
The suppressMessages() function is useful for avoiding non-useful or cluttered output when using complex packages or functions.
